titles.title: NO PBMs Act
Neighborhood Options for Patients Buying Medicines Act
NO PBMs Act
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to assure pharmacy access and choice for Medicare beneficiaries.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Neighborhood Options for Patients Buying Medicines Act or the NO PBMs Act
This bill specifies that prescription drug plan sponsors and pharmacy benefit managers under the Medicare prescription drug benefit must permit any pharmacy that meets the plan's contractual terms for network participation to participate in that network and that such terms must be reasonable. The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services must set standards for reasonable terms.
